abstract: Justice Dept drops all charges against Xi Xiaoxing, chairman of Temple University physics department, after learning that blueprint of sophisticated American-made device known as pocket heater which agents believed he was sharing with China was for different technology; embarrassing mistake, following heels of similar cases, raises question of whether Justice Dept is falsely prosecuting innocent Chinese-Americans in its attempt to root out Chinese spies.
lead_paragraph: All charges against the Temple University professor were dropped after it became apparent the Justice Department had misinterpreted a key piece of evidence.

headline.main: U.S. Drops Charges That Professor Shared Technology With China
headline.print_headline: U.S. Abandoning Spying Charges Against Scholar
